title: Communities Act (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to

2021.

title: Communities Act (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (COVID-19 Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (COVID-19 Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No. 
2) Regulations 2021 shall have effect as if the following were substituted for 
Regulation 4(1): 

Where the Minister is satisfied that the requirements of the following will be 
complied with: 

(a) 

(b) 

these Regulations, 

the Commission Implementing Regulation, and 

(c) Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/521 of 24 
March 2021, as amended by Commission Implementing 
Regulation 2021/1071 of 29 June 2021. 

he or she may, subject to these Regulations, grant an authorisation to a person 
for the purposes of Article 1 of the Commission Implementing Regulation. 

1 OJ L 85, 12.3.2021, p.190 
2 OJ L 104, 25.3.2021, p.52 
3 OJ L 230, 30.6.2021, p.28 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [421] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 July, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
